Carta (formerly eShares) | ONSITE | Full-time | NYC - New York, NY Carta is building the network graph of asset ownership through corporate governance. We help 7,000+ privately held companies and a small (growing) number of public companies track who owns what. We're growing rapidly and are hiring across the board.

We're building out a new team in our New York, NY (NYC) office to handle publicly traded companies.

---------------------------------------------

Senior+ backend or full stack engineers

---------------------------------------------

Required:

* 4+ years professional software development experience

Nice-to-have:

* Experience with Financial Information eXchange (FIX) protocol

* Professional experience in Finance, Banking or Exchanges (ACH, Wires, Trading Stocks, etc)

* Familiarity with Python and Django

* Experience writing unit tests

Drop a note to robert.balousek+jan18 [at] carta [dot] com for more info.
